import java.io.*;

class Main
{
	public static void main(String args[])
	{
		String s;
		long N;
		BufferedReader br=new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
		for(;;)
		{
			try
			{
				s=br.readLine();
				N=Long.parseLong(s);
				System.out.println(N-1);
			}
			catch(Exception e)
			{
				System.exit(0);
			}
		}
	}
}
